toolbar.copyTool: Copy To Clipboard And Hide Toolbar

notifications.exportImageToClipboardOK: The picture has been successfully copied to the clipboard
notifications.exportImageToClipboardErr: Failed to copy the image to the clipboard
notifications.exportImageToFileOK: The image has been successfully exported to file

graph.textEditorMovementTips: Hold down the Alt key and move the mouse to change the position of the text box

html.dragRegionTitle: You can scroll the mouse to zoom in and out. Double click on the window to close it
